commit.message:
FilterOutputStream.java (write(byte[])): Rewrite according to JDK 1.2 docs.

        * java/io/FilterOutputStream.java (write(byte[])): Rewrite according
        to JDK 1.2 docs.
        (write(byte[],int,int)): ditto.
